page.title: 06ROYAL EVENT: MAYFIELD SCHOOL
page.content: ON JUNE 9th 1985, 30 INVITATIONS ARRIVED AT MAYFIELD SCHOOL FROM THE LORD CHAMBERLAIN INVITING 30 PUPILS TO ATTEND THE ARRIVAL CEREMONY OF THE PRESIDENT OF MEXICO AND SENORA DE LA MADRID AT BUCKINGHAM PALACE ON JUNE 11th . AFTER TRAVELLING BY TUBE FROM EAST PUTNEY TO St.JAMES PARK, THE PARTY MADE IT'S WAY THROUGH VAST CROWDS OF PEOPLE , NUMEROUS POLICEMAN AND ROAD BARRICADES INTO THE COURTYARD OF THE PALACE , WHERE WE EAGERLY AWAITED A GLIMPSE OF SOME MEMBERS OF THE ROYAL FAMILY. WE WERE ON THE FRONT ROW OF THE INVITED ONLOOKERS AND VERY OON SAW THE QUEEN DRIVE BY IN A LARGE DAIMLER CAR,ACCOMPANIED BY PRINCE PHILIP;THEY WERE ON THEIR WAY TO VICTORIA RAILWAY SATION TO MEET THE PRESIDENT AND OTHER MEMBERS OF THE
